TEXT.TITLE: EA ENGINEERING <EACO> HAS AIR FORCE CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: EA Engineering Science and Technology Inc said it was awarded a four-year task order contract by the U.S. Airfaorce to provide technical services under its Installation Restoration Program. The company said the contract has a potential value of 9.5 mln dlrs. EA will assess the feasibility of cleaning up hazardous waste sites at selected Air Force installations across the country and design remedial strategies for each site. Reuter
